name: Memare
description:
DISCLAIMER:

- I messed up the UI canvas, please maximize the game to see all UI elements

- For some reason there is no lifeline on the diver in the web build. The Windows build has it working fine

My entry for Ludum Dare 48. Theme was 'Deeper and Deeper'. 

Used software: Unity, Aseprite, Audacity, Gimp
